Author: Francisco O
Title: [ANN][ICO]THE WORLD’S FIRST DECENTRALIZED P2P BIDDING PLATFORM
Body: Is a very simple system, We have a platform like eBay but instead here you can put any product from used, open box or brand new and generate tickets for a Bid raffle sale. but instead of having a Retail price like Ebay, you have a ticket price for up to 80% or more discount with many ticket sales you will raise the total amount you want for your product at the same time the buyer will buy for very cheap price. The most exiting part that with OfferZone everyone is a winner because if you don't win the raffle bid you get a full refund of your tokens.

Author: Francisco O
Title: [ANN][ICO]THE WORLD’S FIRST DECENTRALIZED P2P BIDDING PLATFORM
Body: Visit our website and register for FREE to start using OfferZone platform.  Where you can buy & sell products or services; Sell your used products, open box, brand new and earn BIG PROFITS. With OfferZone platform you can sell any products at over 80% less than any competitor and make over 80% and in most cases over 150% PROFIT. This is only posible with OfferZone because we leverage with the power of the community by Offering a product thru a Bid raffle like ticketing system. You can place a product that has a value over $500 on the market with a low price only $50, or $20 you can put any price you desire. Many users will Bid on your product this way you will Raised funds and make over $500 dollars. What make us so unique that our system refunds the OFZ tokens to the non winners. This way at OfferZone everyone is a winner.

Author: Francisco O
Title: [ANN][ICO]THE WORLD’S FIRST DECENTRALIZED P2P BIDDING PLATFORM
Body: YES we can update; We started with building the OfferZone platform first over 1 year ago. We wanted to have a fully working platform in order to offer a working product to the online business, e-commerce community. Also innovation is our passion so we build something never seen in crypto and buying / selling online. Then after we finish the platform we Founded the ICO OfferZone. And from there you can see in the road map how everything is coming along. We also purchase 140 bitcoin and litecoin mining machines which will launched on the Pre-sale opening date OCT 1, 2018 everyone can register for free on our OfferZone platform and bid on the 140 machines, you can win this machines by just Joining the ICO and bidding on them with your OFZ tokens.  After that we Will continue doing Community Bid Raffles every 3 months. and in the future expand the project and bring many more services with the Version 2.0 platform.

Author: TimeTeller
Title: [ANN][ICO]THE WORLD’S FIRST DECENTRALIZED P2P BIDDING PLATFORM

Author: Francisco O
Title: [ANN][ICO]THE WORLD’S FIRST DECENTRALIZED P2P BIDDING PLATFORM
Body: Our platform is its first in the world that allows you to Bid like a raffle on any product or service within the community. But unlike the traditional raffles on the market, if your not the lucky winner you lose your ticker purchase. With OfferZone no one loses there ticket purchase, that is what makes it so unique and exclusive, you can literally Bid on a product wait for the final end result and if you dont win You get a full refund of your tokens. All Bids have to be done with OFZ tokens that is the usability of the tokens. You can also Promote your product or Service VIP by donating tokens to the community and your product or service will be blasted to all the OfferZone community. The seller of a product can manually create the amount of tickets for the Offer, the price and set the duration of the Offer BID.  EXAMPLE:  Seller can place a New Macbook 13inch computer for sale - marker price is about $1350.00,  Seller can create: YOU CAN CREATE AS MANY AS YOU WANT, BASED ON THE VALUE OF YOUR PRODUCT, BUT THE PROFITS ARE HUGE HUGE....  You can create example:  * 100 OfferBid tickets for $30 x100 = $3000 Total sales This means you earn over 100% profit * 50 OfferBid tickets for $100 x 50 = $5000 Total sales This means you earn over 200% profit * 25 OfferBid tikets for $200 x 25 = $5000 Total sales This means you earn over 200% profit   This is just an example, all of this numbers vary base on the product and the seller desired Profit.

Author: Francisco O
Title: [ANN][ICO]THE WORLD’S FIRST DECENTRALIZED P2P BIDDING PLATFORM
Body: THE WORLD’S FIRST DECENTRALIZED P2P BIDDING PLATFORM   The OFFER-ZONE platform is a unique place where people from all over the World meet, all interested in various good and services. Here you can buy and sell any products wether there used, brand new, open box or digital and maximize your earnings.    THE MAIN PURPOSE The world´s first Decentralize P2P bidding platform A platform that will disrupt the e-commerce industry by allowing anyone in the world to pay less and profit more by selling online within a community that bring millions of people together for the same purpose.                FEEL FREE TO ASK US

Author: Thishastoend
Title: [ANN][ICO]THE WORLD’S FIRST DECENTRALIZED P2P BIDDING PLATFORM
Body: Why do you even need a token for that? It only creates more volatility and retail doesn't want to deal with btc volatility, and instead of reducing it you creating a token, that is dependant on eth price that is dependant on btc price, besides who wants to have another step to move from eth to your token? Why not just keep it within eth smart contracts and use eth for settlement?
